thread.title: "Vampire Diaries'" Nina Dobrev and "Public Morals'" Austin Stowell Are a Couple

title: "Vampire Diaries'" Nina Dobrev and "Public Morals'" Austin Stowell Are a Couple
text:
"Vampire Diaries'" Nina Dobrev and "Public Morals'" Austin Stowell Are a Couple Posted just a moment ago 
The CW (LOS ANGELES) -- Nina Dobrev and Public Morals actor Austin Stowell made their romance official on Tuesday, after realizing they weren't connected on social media. 
Stowell, 30, apparently was looking over Dobrev's Twitter page when he made the discovery and posted a screenshot revealing the "follow" button. "That awkward moment when you realize you don't follow your girlfriend on Twitter #socialmediaproblems @ninadobrev," he captioned the post. 
Coincidentally, the former Vampire Diaries ' actress, 26, realized she wasn't following her boyfriend either. "That awkward moment when u realize ur not following him either&gotta do it realfast b4 he realizes," she captioned a screenshot of her own. 
The two were first spotted kissing while hanging out in West Hollywood, according to E! Online . Since then, they've reportedly been seen getting cozy with each other during trips New York and St. Tropez. 
Dobrev previously dated her Vampire Diaries co-star Ian Somerhalder. They broke up in 2013. 
Public Morals airs Tuesday's at 10 p.m. Eastern time on TNT.
